subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: When the United States opens defense of its first Davis Cup title since 1995 this week, Patrick McEnroe will once more be able to rely on Andy Roddick, James Blake, and the twins Bob and Mike Bryan.
snippet: When the United States opens defense of its first Davis Cup title since 1995 this week, Patrick McEnroe will once more be able to rely on Andy Roddick, James Blake, and the twins Bob and Mike Bryan.
